EmailTemplate.name: Final Cancellation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Cancellation of Nissan Fleet Evaluation vehicle
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Evaluation_Booking__c.Contact_First_Name__c},
Your request to cancel your evaluation vehicle has been acknowledged and actioned in our systems.
Vehicle: {!Evaluation_Booking__c.Model__c} Registration: {!Evaluation_Booking__c.Rego__c}
Should you wish to re-schedule your evaluation vehicle for a future date, please contact {!Evaluation_Booking__c.Nissan_Representative__c} on {!Evaluation_Booking__c.Nissan_Representative_Email__c} or {!Evaluation_Booking__c.Nissan_Representative_Mobile__c}.
Yours Sincerely,
The Nissan Fleet team.
